The Dining Room can accommodate up to 50 guests, which is perfect for your gathering of 40 friends and family. The rental rate is $125 per hour on Fridays, and there is a minimum spend requirement of $1000.

 

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, please let us know. You can check out our full menu at eattaco.ca/menu.

 

Best regards,

Hi there,

Thank you for getting back to me so quickly! Unfortunately our date is locked, but please let me know if anything opens up.

Thanks again and Happy Holidays!
Katlyn 


On Sun, Nov 10, 2024 at 1:22 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Katlyn,

Thank you for reaching out! 

Unfortunately, we are fully booked on Saturday, December 14th. We do have some availability on other dates. If your dates are flexible, please visit our website at eattaco.ca/events to check for openings.

We appreciate your interest and hope to work with you in the future.

Best,

TacoTaco Events Team

----- Original Message -----

From: Katlyn Olo

Subject: Inquiry -- Event Booking -- Classy Christmas 13

Hi there, 

I'm currently looking for a private and safe space for our annual Classy Christmas Party on Saturday, December 14. We hold it every year and in fact this will be the 13th one this year!

A little background on our event:
It is more of a formal occasion - guests tend to dress up and we like to offer appetizers and hors d'oeuvres (buffet style). In the past we have hosted our event at places like The Bedford Academy, The Alpine, Paupers, Tequila Bookworm, The Goodman, and Boxcar Social.

I'm looking for a space that will accommodate at least 60-80 people. In 2022, we had 73 guests. I'm interested in Moonlight Lounge and wondering how many people it can accommodate? We have also booked live entertainment (1 singer songwriter type style), so I want to make sure that is okay as well. He brings his guitar and amp so it's not much of a set up. 

Please let me know the associated costs for food and event space. In the past to rent the space privately we agreed to a Bar Minimum spend, it would be great to have this option again. 

Thanks in advance,
Katlyn Olo
647.298.5424

Hi Nya,

- What custom cocktail were you thinking? We look to accommodate but like to double check with our bar team to see if we have the all/majority of the ingredients to make the cocktail
- Yes bottles of champagne are available!
- You can bring cake and we can store it until you want it brought out.
- Yes you can connect via bluetooth

started to finalize our plans, we have a few questions about the event and
food.

   attendance of 25 guests? Would we be allowed to move tables around on the
   day of the event?


Those are the current questions we have! Thanks for helping us make our
event come alive, and we hope to hear back from you soon!


Sincerely,

Carmen

Thanks for your reply, all the pricing sounds great and your food looks amazing. I did actually stop by your restaurant earlier today to see if anyone was around and to check out the space. On Sat, Nov 9, 2024 at 9:59 AM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Mona,

Nice to meet you! My name is Liem and I help with event inquiries here at Tacotaco. We would love to host you. The front dining space is available that day. The cost is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $1000 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked cash bar and clean up.

If you're interested in catering, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. 

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

Let us know if you have any questions!

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca

Hi Chris,

For light apps and the 2 taco + apps, we just rely on our website to look at options: eattaco.ca/menu. I've attached the buffet menu for reference. If you'd like the break down for catering, here it is:

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. 

For placing an order, feel free to respond to this email with the order and we'll relay it to our kitchen staff!

Sarah

Hi Ken,

Thank you for your email! I apologize for the delay in responding. I am so excited to help organize your workplace holiday party!

The Moonlight Lounge is available for your event on December 1st at 5pm. We can accommodate 75-125 guests comfortably for a 4 hour event.

* **$16 per person:** Two tacos and appetizers.

Thank you for your help with this. I look forward to hearing from you to set up a call to organize this event.

Hi Ken,

Thank you for your email! I apologize for the delay in responding. I am so excited to help organize your workplace holiday party!

The Moonlight Lounge is available for your event on December 1st at 5pm. We can accommodate 75-125 guests comfortably for a 4 hour event.

The minimum spend for Sunday events is $1000. Each drink ticket is $8 before tax and tip. Here are some catering packages to consider:

* **$10 per person:** One taco and appetizers.
* **$16 per person:** Two tacos and appetizers.
* **$30 per person:** Plated buffet.

Let me know what package you're interested in and I can send you the menu. For food, we can finalize that closer to the date. 

Have a great evening!

Warmly,
TacoTaco Events Team

Good Evening,

It was for the Central Toronto Veterinary Referral Clinic, and roughly 75-125 guests. We would be looking at a 4 hour event, with some variation of food and 1-2 drink tickets per guest. 

 

Thank you for your help with this. I look forward to hearing from you to set up a call to organize this event.

 

Take care!

html:
Hi friends,

Great, thank you! I've noted that the kitchen closes at 10:30 pm, so I'll give people a heads-up. I'll also pay when I get there tonight. 

One last question, in place of a birthday cake I'm bringing some mini donuts. Would you folks be able to provide me a small plate to put them on? 

Thanks so much for your help!!!

Cheers,
Raizel Harjosubroto (she/her)


On Fri, Nov 8, 2024 at 10:02 AM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Raizel,

No worries! Yes people can order their own food, but the kitchen closes at 10:30pm.

Taping on the wall should be no issue! As long as you put holes into the wall.

We ask for payment the day of the event! You can e-transfer today or pay when you're there

Ok to bring plastic cups! And yes you'd share the Spotify playlist and we'll play from the tablet

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca



On Wed, Nov 6, 2024 at 11:21 PM Raizel Harjosubroto <raizelharjo@gmail.com> wrote:
Oh! One more question - am I allowed to bring plastic cups for a game? Let me know! 

Raizel Harjosubroto (she/her)


On Wed, Nov 6, 2024 at 10:37 PM Raizel Harjosubroto <raizelharjo@gmail.com> wrote:
Hi friends!

I’m looking forward to this Friday! 

Regarding catering, I don’t think we’ll actually need it. But just to clarify, if I don’t do catering, folks can buy food during the evening, correct? And food + drinks that are purchased will contribute to the minimum spend too right? 

I was thinking of having a passive mini activity that may require taping pieces of paper to a wall temporarily, is this allowed? It shouldn’t take too much space. :) 

Last question, can you remind me how you’d like me to pay the rest of the balance?

Thanks SO much for your help! I will likely be one of the first to arrive and I imagine more guests will come closer to 9pm onward. I’m guessing when I get there you can show me how to connect a Spotify playlist into the system.

Cheers!

Raizel Harjosubroto (she/her)


On Tue, Nov 5, 2024 at 12:55 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Raizel,

Hope you had a good weekend! We look forward to hosting your event.

Just wanted to confirm, did you plan on getting any catering or drink packages for your events? I'll list the options below:

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. 

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca



On Fri, Nov 1, 2024 at 5:50 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

I haven’t received any confirmation that you’ve accepted the etransfer but I did receive your Google calendar invite. Can you please confirm receipt and if there is anything else needed from me? 

 

Thank you!

Raizel Harjosubroto (she/her)

 

 

On Sun, Oct 27, 2024 at 6:04 PM Raizel Harjosubroto <raizelharjo@gmail.com> wrote:

Hi there,

 

Apologies for the delayed response and thank you for your patience! I'm attaching a photo of my driver's license and sent an etransfer of $375 with 'November08' as the password. 

 

Please let me know if you need anything else to confirm the space! Thanks so much for your help. 

 

Cheers,

Raizel Harjosubroto (she/her)

On Wed, Nov 6, 2024, 1:21 p.m. Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Elvan,

Correct! For 4 hours, it'd be $500 in terms of rental. Food packages would be a separate cost, and for lights apps. For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and mexican bruschetta. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 3-5 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. 

No need for exact number of guests! We ask for the final count 1 week before the event so we can relay it to staff if you order any catering.  Otherwise it doesn't matter to us.

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca

Hello,

So it's going to be $500, right? Also, how is the process for the food service? How much is it going to be for around 25 people for appetizers? And I guess, that's a separate cost on top of the room booking fee, right?

The other thing that I'm curious about is if it's possible to give you the exact number of guests later, like maybe a month before the event? Because, I'm not sure about the number right now...

Please let me know, then we can start the booking process.

Thanks so much,

Elvan

Hi Elvan,

Nice to meet you! My name is Liem and I help with event inquiries here at Tacotaco. We would love to host you. The front dining space is available that day. The cost is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $1000 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked cash bar and clean up. For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. You can choose any 4 sides/appetizers. Let me know if you have any questions!

(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca

On Thu, Nov 7, 2024 at 1:02 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

 

Hi Riley,

Thank you for reaching out! I'm excited to help you plan your work holiday party.

With 16 guests, the Dining Room would be more suitable. The rental rate is $125 per hour, and the minimum spend is $1000.

We offer a range of services to enhance your event, including a dance floor, professional sound system with karaoke, party lights, a smoke machine, and a private bar staffed with two bartenders. You can connect your own music via Bluetooth or use our provided tablet with a Spotify playlist. We also have a TV for use with HDMI connectivity, and our kitchen is open until 11pm.

For catering, we offer a variety of delicious options, including:

* **Light Appetizers ($6 per person):** Perfect for birthdays and late night eats.
* **One Taco and Appetizers ($10 per person):** A great choice for a casual meal.
* **Two Tacos and Appetizers ($16 per person):** Ideal for a satisfying meal.
* **Plated Buffet ($30 per person):** A classic option for a formal event.

We're looking forward to hearing from you!

Best,
TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

subject: Holiday Party Inquiry (Moonlight Lounge)
text:
Hello Taco Taco,

I hope this message finds you well! I’m reaching out on behalf of Healthy
Planet, as we’re looking for a restaurant to host our upcoming company
Holiday party. We were hoping to hold the event at your establishment on
December 7th, and I’d like to inquire about availability, as well as a few
specific details.

We anticipate approximately 80 attendees and would ideally like to begin
the event around 8:00 pm, running until about midnight. Additionally, we
would like to accommodate dietary restrictions, specifically for guests who
follow Halal or vegetarian diets. Could you let us know if this would be
possible with your menu offerings?

Another consideration is that everyone attending will be bringing a gift
for our annual gift exchange, so we would appreciate it if there could be
space available for guests to store their items during the event.

If you’re available on December 7th, we would love to hear more about
pricing. Ideally our budget would be $40-$45/PP and would like to keep
alcohol out of the company's expenditure, as it's not something our company
covers, but know our guests will be purchasing on their own account.

Looking forward to hearing from you and hopefully working together to make
this a memorable evening!

Best regards,

Samantha Leon
--
*Thank you,*


*Healthy Planet | Stockyards*
*1980 St Clair Ave W, Toronto, ON M6N 0A3
<https://maps.google.com/?q=47+Railside+Rd.+North+York,+ON+M3A+1B2&entry=gmail&source=g>*

*stockyards@healthyplanetcanada.com <mgarncarz@healthyplanetcanada.com>Tel:
(416)902-7750*


1. Please send confirmation email when order is received.

2. Please let us know if minimum is not met.

*3. Please forward all Credits to* credit@healthyplanetcanada.com
<credits@healthyplanetcanada.com> *and cc: *
stockyards@healthyplanetcanada.com <credits@healthyplanetcanada.com>

Hello Taco Taco,

I hope this message finds you well! I’m reaching out on behalf of Healthy Planet, as we’re looking for a restaurant to host our upcoming company Holiday party. We were hoping to hold the event at your establishment on December 7th, and I’d like to inquire about availability, as well as a few specific details.

We anticipate approximately 80 attendees and would ideally like to begin the event around 8:00 pm, running until about midnight. Additionally, we would like to accommodate dietary restrictions, specifically for guests who follow Halal or vegetarian diets. Could you let us know if this would be possible with your menu offerings?

Another consideration is that everyone attending will be bringing a gift for our annual gift exchange, so we would appreciate it if there could be space available for guests to store their items during the event.

If you’re available on December 7th, we would love to hear more about pricing. Ideally our budget would be $40-$45/PP and would like to keep alcohol out of the company's expenditure, as it's not something our company covers, but know our guests will be purchasing on their own account. 

Looking forward to hearing from you and hopefully working together to make this a memorable evening!

Best regards,

Samantha Leon 

--

Thanks so much
Georgina

For our catering, we generally lay it out on a long table and people can grab a plate and whatever items they'd like. Then they can choose to eat while standing or sitting.

On Wed, Nov 6, 2024 at 9:18 AM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
We have different catering and drink packages so it'd likely be easiest just to share those:

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference.

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca

What would be the cost of a taco bar for the guests? And then appetizers like chips and salsa and guac? For the bar, what is the cost for either open bar or offering drink tickets?

Georgina 

On Tue, Nov 5, 2024, 5:42 p.m. Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Georgina,

- You could use the patio as well and welcome to bring heaters! I'd say we can comfortably fit 50 people in our front dining space though, we've had that number of people in the past with no issues once we move the tables in the middle.
- Correct, even if there is a private event in the back, this is where we would provide exceptions to allow people through the back door when they need it wheelchair accessible. Event hosts are generally very understanding of that. 
- To be absolutely safe, we'd allow you to bring food for your guests. While we can provide processes to make sure its dedicated fryer, I wouldn't want to run the risk of any potential cross-contamination 

TacoTaco Events Team

html:
Hi friends!

I’m looking forward to this Friday! 

Regarding catering, I don’t think we’ll actually need it. But just to clarify, if I don’t do catering, folks can buy food during the evening, correct? And food + drinks that are purchased will contribute to the minimum spend too right? 

I was thinking of having a passive mini activity that may require taping pieces of paper to a wall temporarily, is this allowed? It shouldn’t take too much space. :) 

Last question, can you remind me how you’d like me to pay the rest of the balance?

Thanks SO much for your help! I will likely be one of the first to arrive and I imagine more guests will come closer to 9pm onward. I’m guessing when I get there you can show me how to connect a Spotify playlist into the system.

Cheers!

Raizel Harjosubroto (she/her)


On Tue, Nov 5, 2024 at 12:55 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Raizel,

Hope you had a good weekend! We look forward to hosting your event.

Just wanted to confirm, did you plan on getting any catering or drink packages for your events? I'll list the options below:

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. 

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca

Hi Luan,

On Sat, Oct 26, 2024 at 12:29 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Becky,

Sounds good for the food choices! We'll relay it to the staff.

- For food - absolutely fine for it to come out between 9:45pm-10:00pm. It can be kept out throughout the night, so no worries about that.
- For drinks - sounds good! If you'd like as well, we can offer an open bar with a set budget (before or after tax and gratuity, up to you). 
- I don't recall us having non-alcoholic beers, but sweet tea can absolutely be made without any alcohol! 
- Food table will be across the bar!
- That works for us in terms of timing
- We do have coat check downstairs but that is $3/person. People normally leave their coats on the booths or other areas.

On Fri, Oct 25, 2024 at 5:02 PM Becky MacDonald <rmacdo47@gmail.com> wrote:
Hi Luan, 

Happy Friday 🙂. We are so excited for our event in almost 2 weeks!! 

Below are our food choices and the amount of people we have RSVP'd (I'll email you again 72 hours before if the number changes). I've also included some reminders and final questions below (questions are bolded). 

Amount of guests: 105 (including Gaurav and I)

Food choices (appetizer package / $5 per person) (can you please not add cilantro to anything on top - it's fine if it's in the Pico de Gallo) 
  1. Loaded nachos with ground beef
  2. Crispy cauliflower wings
  3. Chicken quesadillas
  4. French fries (not the loaded kind)
  5. Jalapeno Poppers
Reminders/Final Questions
  • For the food - can it come out between 9:45pm and 10:00pm? With this said, does it need to be taken away at a certain time? If so, we can serve it a bit earlier but I'll wait for your response. 
  • We are going to give each person 4 drink tickets and then they can pay for their own drinks after that. 
  • Some people won't be drinking alcohol - I know you said there will be mocktail options, but do you have any non-alcoholic beer as well? And can we serve the sweet tea without vodka as a N/A option?
  • We discussed this, but we don't want the food table on the dancefloor, so if it could be placed across from the bar or closer to the back that would be great 🙂.
  • We are planning to be there 30-45 minutes before the guests arrive at 8:30pm. In case there are questions for us, to set up the playlist, and hang one piece of decoration on the wall. 
  • Finally, do you have any coat racks?
Let me know if you have any questions for us!! 

Thanks for all your help 🙂

Becky & Gaurav

On Sat, Nov 2, 2024 at 7:14 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Andrew,

Thank you for reaching out to TacoTaco Events! 

The Moonlight Lounge is a great space for a fundraiser and absolutely can accommodate a group of your size. We have a spacious dance floor that your students could utilize for their performances. We also have a full sound system with a Bluetooth connection and karaoke, so your students can plug in and play their music.

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizza. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person.  Let me know what package you're interested in  and I'll send you the appropriate menu.

And yup! It's accessible for students.

For the Moonlight Lounge, our rental rate is $125 per hour on Sundays or minimum spend of $1,000. This includes our additional services such as a private bar, dance floor, sound system, and more.

Please let me know if you have any further questions.

Warmly,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

----- Original Message -----

From: Andrew Tribe

Subject: Taco Taco Event Space

Good morning, 

My name is Andrew Tribe and I am the Artistic Director of the Mainstage Theatre Company in Toronto. We are a not-for-profit youth theatre company that mounts two productions per year in Toronto with youth ages 11 - 21. 

We are looking to host a fundraiser at the end of our year to celebrate the year's accomplishments and look towards the future. We also hope we can have a few of our students perform some songs (with keyboard accompaniment). Your space came recommended by one of our staff members! :) 

Our tentative dates would be either the evening of Sunday, June 1, 2025 or Sunday, June 8, 2025. 

We would be interested in the Moonlight Lounge space (194). 

What can you share about food? Is the space accessible for all ages? What is the approximate cost? 

Our company is operated by a Board of Directors, so as much info you can provide, I can relay it back to them. 

Thank you so much! 

Warmly,
Andrew. 

Andrew Tribe (he/him)
Artistic Director
Mainstage Theatre Company
360A Bloor St W, PO Box 68513 Walmer
Toronto, ON  M5S 3C9

html:
Hi there, 

Thanks so much for the info above! Just looping in some other colleagues who are helping to plan the event. 

What would you recommend as a healthy alcohol budget for 25 people having 3 - 5 drinks each (with some not drinking alcohol). Maybe $1500 to start? 

Thanks,
Kaitlin

On Wed, Nov 6, 2024 at 1:19 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Kaitlin,

Let me lay out all the food options just so you can see all the changes:

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu (updated menu). If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. 

For the open bar, we've changed our process where it's generally easier so you set a budget so that when that budget is reached, it changes to guest purchasing drinks or you can increase the budget. You can choose whatever drinks to include in an open bar, most people keep everything except cocktails.

Rental fee for a Thursday night is $100/hr. If you can let me know what time frame you were thinking, confirm the buffet is which one you want a price for, and set a budget for the open bar, I can get started on a quote for you to review!

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca



On Wed, Nov 6, 2024 at 7:30 AM Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca> wrote:
yes please! And can you confirm what the open bar consists of in terms of spirits wine etc? 

How long is the rental for? 

And can I get a copy of the menu if it has changed? 

Thank you :) 

On Tue, Nov 5, 2024 at 9:32 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
So just to confirm - you'd want the buffet and an open bar again right? And therefore a price estimate with that as well as rental

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca



On Tue, Nov 5, 2024 at 3:48 PM Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca> wrote:
Hi there, 

No worries! I would be 25-30 max. 

Looking forward to the pricing estimate and please share the menu as well if this has been updated. 

Best, 
Kaitlin

On Tue, Nov 5, 2024 at 3:24 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Kaitlin,

Sorry for missing this! The 12th is still available for the dining space. Pricing has changed a bit since last year, can you confirm the number of people you were looking to bring? I can put together a quote for you to review then. 

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca



On Fri, Nov 1, 2024 at 3:42 PM Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca> wrote:
Hi there, 

I reached out to you last year with a holiday party inquiry. We didn't end up having the budget for it but are really interested in booking for this year's event! 

I wanted to confirm if the pricing and details provided are still accurate that you quoted me last year? 

Also it looks available online but we are interested in the December 12th date for the dining room.

Thanks so much! 
Kaitlin

On Tue, Oct 17, 2023 at 6:56 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hi Kaitlin,

 

Thanks for reaching out to us about our event spaces for rent. I'm happy to answer your additional questions. Here are the details:

 

  1. We can definitely provide a new quote for you. With the buffet food option, alcohol, and rental costs for 35 people, the total amount will be:
  • Buffet: $875
  • Alcohol: $ 2100
  • Rental: $530
  • Tax: $455.65
  • Tip: $ 535.5
  • Grand total is: $4496.15

 

2. Yes, you will have use of the TV screen in the dining room. It's available for your use during the event.

 

3. Absolutely! You are welcome to bring in a DJ or live musicians for your event.

 

4. Karaoke is included in the dining room rental and microphones are available.

 

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, please feel free to ask. We look forward to hosting your event!

 

From: Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca>
Sent: Tuesday, October 17, 2023 2:07 PM
To: info@eattaco.ca
Cc: Carolyn Dossal <cdossal@blackjet.ca>
Subject: Re: Holiday Party Quote Request - Taco Taco

 

Hi there, 

 

I spoke to our event committee and we had a few additional questions if you can please confirm when you get a chance! 

 

1. Can you please provide a new quote with the buffet food option, alcohol, rental costs etc for 35 people (with tax & tip included)? 

2. Will we have use of the TV screen in the dining room? 

3. Can we bring in a DJ or live musicians (no more than 3)? 

4. Is Karaoke included in the dining room rental or do you have a microphone we can use? 

 

Thanks so much! 

Kaitlin

 

On Mon, Oct 16, 2023 at 1:52 PM Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca> wrote:

Gotcha, thank you! I'll consult with my team and get back to you regarding any further questions. 

 

On Mon, Oct 16, 2023 at 1:42 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Nope. We can add more variety; but keep the same portions.

 

From: Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca>
Sent: Monday, October 16, 2023 1:34 PM
To: info@eattaco.ca
Subject: Re: Holiday Party Quote Request - Taco Taco

 

Thank you! What would it be extra if we wanted say 4 mains vs 3? 

 

 

 

On Mon, Oct 16, 2023 at 1:23 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hey Kaitlyn, please see attached for the menu.

 

From: Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca>
Sent: Monday, October 16, 2023 1:13 PM
To: info@eattaco.ca
Subject: Re: Holiday Party Quote Request - Taco Taco

 

Hello, 

 

Thanks so much for providing the info above! All makes sense. Could you please let me know what it would be with the full plated buffet food option instead? 

 

Best, 

Kaitlin

 

On Mon, Oct 16, 2023 at 10:23 AM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hi Kaitlin,

 

Thanks for reaching out! We would be happy to provide a quote for your Holiday party at Taco Taco. The dining room can accommodate a group size of up to 50 people, which would be a good fit for your group of 25-35.

 

For availability, we have the 6th, 13th and 14th available. For food, we can offer light appetizers for $5 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizza. If you want to do tacos+appetizers, we can do it for between $10-15 per person, depending on the number of tacos you'd like. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $25 per person. We do allow outside cake and dessert. Let me know what package you're interested in and I'll send you the appropriate menu.

 

The following is a quote:

  • Food (assuming $15 taco package) = $525
  • Drinks: $2100 (avg open bar cost is $50pp; but assuming $60pp in this case)
  • Rental: $530
  • Tip (just on food and drinks):$472
  • Tax: $410
  • Total: $ 4037.15

 

Let me know if you have any questions!

 

 

From: Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca>
Sent: Monday, October 16, 2023 9:10 AM
To: info@eattaco.ca
Subject: Holiday Party Quote Request - Taco Taco

 

Hi there,


I hope you had a nice weekend! I was hoping you could help with providing me a quote for a Holiday party at Taco Taco for my agency Blackjet. See details below: 

 

Group Size: 25-35

Time: 4-10pm 

Potential Dates: Dec 6, 7, 13, 14

 

Can you please provide a quote that includes costs for food, alcohol (for the 6 hr period) & any other costs associated with renting the space? I was thinking that the dining room would be a good fit for our group but open to receiving a quote for the moonlight lounge as well. 

 

Our budget is in the $8k range. 

 

Thank you! 

Kaitlin

--

 

Kaitlin Buttrum
Account Manager

C 289.707.5962

507 King Street E, Suite #222
Toronto, ON M5A 1M3

On Wed, Nov 6, 2024 at 9:18 AM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
We have different catering and drink packages so it'd likely be easiest just to share those:

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference.

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

TacoTaco Events Team

Hi Georgina,

- You could use the patio as well and welcome to bring heaters! I'd say we can comfortably fit 50 people in our front dining space though, we've had that number of people in the past with no issues once we move the tables in the middle.
- Correct, even if there is a private event in the back, this is where we would provide exceptions to allow people through the back door when they need it wheelchair accessible. Event hosts are generally very understanding of that. 
- To be absolutely safe, we'd allow you to bring food for your guests. While we can provide processes to make sure its dedicated fryer, I wouldn't want to run the risk of any potential cross-contamination

Hi Chris,

For payment, you can do etransfer or pay at the restaurant. At the restaurant, if you use credit card, there's a 2.4% surchage.

Hi Chris,

For light apps and the 2 taco + apps, we just rely on our website to look at options: eattaco.ca/menu. I've attached the buffet menu for reference. If you'd like the break down for catering, here it is:

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. 

For placing an order, feel free to respond to this email with the order and we'll relay it to our kitchen staff! 

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca

And yup! You can arrive early to set up.

 

From: Chris Reid <chris.f.reid93@gmail.com>
Sent: September 23, 2024 9:09 AM
To: info@eattaco.ca
Subject: Re: Event Contract 11/09/2024

 

Hi there,

 

Contracts looks great! Confirming my acceptance - please see attached my ID as well. I've sent the e-transfer as well using the given email and password.

 

Two more questions from my end:

 

1. For appetizer catering ($6/person option) do I request specific menu items? Or can I leave that to your choice? I know I didn't request that initially so if I can add that that would be great!

2. Am I able to arrive 1 hour early to setup decorations? Will be some standard birthday decorations (i.e. a banner, some balloons, etc) and absolutely nothing that will be difficult to clean like confetti.

 

Thank you and looking forward to this!

 

Cheers,

 

Chris

 

On Sat, Sep 21, 2024 at 1:54 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hi Christopher Reid,

Please see attached for the event contract. The contract has been pre-filled but if you can't see the details, please view the contract on a computer rather than a phone. Let me know if you have any questions otherwise you can simply respond to this email saying that you accept it, and attach a picture of your ID. To fully reserve the date, please transfer the deposit to info@eattaco.ca, with the password 'November09'.

TacoTaco Events Team
TacoTaco
www.eattaco.ca

Kaitlin

On Tue, Oct 17, 2023 at 6:56 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hi Kaitlin,

 

Thanks for reaching out to us about our event spaces for rent. I'm happy to answer your additional questions. Here are the details:

 

  1. We can definitely provide a new quote for you. With the buffet food option, alcohol, and rental costs for 35 people, the total amount will be:
  • Buffet: $875
  • Alcohol: $ 2100
  • Rental: $530
  • Tax: $455.65
  • Tip: $ 535.5
  • Grand total is: $4496.15

 

2. Yes, you will have use of the TV screen in the dining room. It's available for your use during the event.

 

3. Absolutely! You are welcome to bring in a DJ or live musicians for your event.

 

4. Karaoke is included in the dining room rental and microphones are available.

 

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, please feel free to ask. We look forward to hosting your event!

 

From: Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca>
Sent: Tuesday, October 17, 2023 2:07 PM
To: info@eattaco.ca
Cc: Carolyn Dossal <cdossal@blackjet.ca>
Subject: Re: Holiday Party Quote Request - Taco Taco

 

Hi there, 

 

I spoke to our event committee and we had a few additional questions if you can please confirm when you get a chance! 

 

1. Can you please provide a new quote with the buffet food option, alcohol, rental costs etc for 35 people (with tax & tip included)? 

2. Will we have use of the TV screen in the dining room? 

3. Can we bring in a DJ or live musicians (no more than 3)? 

4. Is Karaoke included in the dining room rental or do you have a microphone we can use? 

 

Thanks so much! 

Kaitlin

 

On Mon, Oct 16, 2023 at 1:52 PM Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca> wrote:

Gotcha, thank you! I'll consult with my team and get back to you regarding any further questions.

Hi Kaitlin,

 

Thanks for reaching out! We would be happy to provide a quote for your Holiday party at Taco Taco. The dining room can accommodate a group size of up to 50 people, which would be a good fit for your group of 25-35.

 

For availability, we have the 6th, 13th and 14th available. For food, we can offer light appetizers for $5 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizza. If you want to do tacos+appetizers, we can do it for between $10-15 per person, depending on the number of tacos you'd like. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $25 per person. We do allow outside cake and dessert. Let me know what package you're interested in and I'll send you the appropriate menu.

 

The following is a quote:

  • Food (assuming $15 taco package) = $525
  • Drinks: $2100 (avg open bar cost is $50pp; but assuming $60pp in this case)
  • Rental: $530
  • Tip (just on food and drinks):$472
  • Tax: $410
  • Total: $ 4037.15

 

Let me know if you have any questions!

 

 

From: Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca>
Sent: Monday, October 16, 2023 9:10 AM
To: info@eattaco.ca
Subject: Holiday Party Quote Request - Taco Taco

 

Hi there,


I hope you had a nice weekend! I was hoping you could help with providing me a quote for a Holiday party at Taco Taco for my agency Blackjet. See details below: 

 

Group Size: 25-35

Time: 4-10pm 

Potential Dates: Dec 6, 7, 13, 14

 

Can you please provide a quote that includes costs for food, alcohol (for the 6 hr period) & any other costs associated with renting the space? I was thinking that the dining room would be a good fit for our group but open to receiving a quote for the moonlight lounge as well. 

 

Our budget is in the $8k range. 

 

Thank you! 

Kaitlin

Elvan

So it's going to be $500, right? Also, how is the process for the food service? How much is it going to be for around 25 people for appetizers? Thanks so much,

Elvan

Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca>, 4 Kas 2024 Pzt, 13:23 tarihinde şunu yazdı:
Hi Elvan,

Nice to meet you! My name is Liem and I help with event inquiries here at Tacotaco. We would love to host you. The front dining space is available that day. The cost is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $1000 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked cash bar and clean up. For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. You can choose any 4 sides/appetizers. Let me know if you have any questions!

(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca

html:
Hi Liem

We saw the place today and it's great but we have some further questions. 

1. The place seemed small for 40 people. Would we also get the patio? We can bring portable heaters if needed
2  The front entrance was not wheelchair accessible but the server told us our guest could enter through back. Would this be possible with event happening in lounge?
3. Our guest that is celiac needs a dedicated fryer for the gluten-free, if you don't have this option, can we bring her food?

Thank you

Hi Georgina,

Thank you for your email! We have a few popular options for you:

* **$6 per person:** Light appetizers. Perfect for birthdays and late night eats.
* **$10 per person:** One taco and appetizers
* **$16 per person:** Two tacos and appetizers.

Let me know which package you're interested in and I can send over a menu.

Absolutely! We can accommodate your guest with Celiac. All of our tacos are gluten-free except the Cod.

You can come by anytime after 5pm to view the space.

Let me know what works best for you.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

TacoTaco Events Team

Georgina

Hey, 

Thank you for this opportunity I’m happy to accept the contract, and very excited to host the event with you! 

Below I have attached the signed contact and my license, and I have deposited the money into your account. Please let me know if there’s anything else you need me to provide! 

Regards, 
Maram Elhag

On Tue, Oct 29, 2024 at 10:17 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Maram Elhag,

Please see attached for the event contract. The contract has been pre-filled but if you can't see the details, please view the contract on a computer rather than a phone. Let me know if you have any questions otherwise you can simply respond to this email saying that you accept it, and attach a picture of your ID (we only need a picture of your face and your name). To fully reserve the date, please transfer the deposit to info@eattaco.ca, with the password 'January02'.

TacoTaco Events Team
TacoTaco
www.eattaco.ca

On Fri, Nov 1, 2024 at 3:42 PM Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca> wrote:
Hi there, 

I reached out to you last year with a holiday party inquiry. We didn't end up having the budget for it but are really interested in booking for this year's event! 

I wanted to confirm if the pricing and details provided are still accurate that you quoted me last year? 

Also it looks available online but we are interested in the December 12th date for the dining room.

Thanks so much! 
Kaitlin

On Tue, Oct 17, 2023 at 6:56 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hi Kaitlin,

 

Thanks for reaching out to us about our event spaces for rent. I'm happy to answer your additional questions. Here are the details:

 

  1. We can definitely provide a new quote for you. With the buffet food option, alcohol, and rental costs for 35 people, the total amount will be:
  • Buffet: $875
  • Alcohol: $ 2100
  • Rental: $530
  • Tax: $455.65
  • Tip: $ 535.5
  • Grand total is: $4496.15

 

2. Yes, you will have use of the TV screen in the dining room. It's available for your use during the event.

 

3. Absolutely! You are welcome to bring in a DJ or live musicians for your event.

 

4. Karaoke is included in the dining room rental and microphones are available.

 

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, please feel free to ask. We look forward to hosting your event!

 

From: Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca>
Sent: Tuesday, October 17, 2023 2:07 PM
To: info@eattaco.ca
Cc: Carolyn Dossal <cdossal@blackjet.ca>
Subject: Re: Holiday Party Quote Request - Taco Taco

 

Hi there, 

 

I spoke to our event committee and we had a few additional questions if you can please confirm when you get a chance! 

 

1. Can you please provide a new quote with the buffet food option, alcohol, rental costs etc for 35 people (with tax & tip included)? 

2. Will we have use of the TV screen in the dining room? 

3. Can we bring in a DJ or live musicians (no more than 3)? 

4. Is Karaoke included in the dining room rental or do you have a microphone we can use? 

 

Thanks so much! 

Kaitlin

 

On Mon, Oct 16, 2023 at 1:52 PM Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca> wrote:

Gotcha, thank you! I'll consult with my team and get back to you regarding any further questions. 

 

On Mon, Oct 16, 2023 at 1:42 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Nope. We can add more variety; but keep the same portions.

 

From: Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca>
Sent: Monday, October 16, 2023 1:34 PM
To: info@eattaco.ca
Subject: Re: Holiday Party Quote Request - Taco Taco

 

Thank you! What would it be extra if we wanted say 4 mains vs 3? 

 

 

 

On Mon, Oct 16, 2023 at 1:23 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hey Kaitlyn, please see attached for the menu.

 

From: Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca>
Sent: Monday, October 16, 2023 1:13 PM
To: info@eattaco.ca
Subject: Re: Holiday Party Quote Request - Taco Taco

 

Hello, 

 

Thanks so much for providing the info above! All makes sense. Could you please let me know what it would be with the full plated buffet food option instead? 

 

Best, 

Kaitlin

 

On Mon, Oct 16, 2023 at 10:23 AM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hi Kaitlin,

 

Thanks for reaching out! We would be happy to provide a quote for your Holiday party at Taco Taco. The dining room can accommodate a group size of up to 50 people, which would be a good fit for your group of 25-35.

 

For availability, we have the 6th, 13th and 14th available. For food, we can offer light appetizers for $5 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizza. If you want to do tacos+appetizers, we can do it for between $10-15 per person, depending on the number of tacos you'd like. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $25 per person. We do allow outside cake and dessert. Let me know what package you're interested in and I'll send you the appropriate menu.

 

The following is a quote:

  • Food (assuming $15 taco package) = $525
  • Drinks: $2100 (avg open bar cost is $50pp; but assuming $60pp in this case)
  • Rental: $530
  • Tip (just on food and drinks):$472
  • Tax: $410
  • Total: $ 4037.15

 

Let me know if you have any questions!

 

 

From: Kaitlin Buttrum <kbuttrum@blackjet.ca>
Sent: Monday, October 16, 2023 9:10 AM
To: info@eattaco.ca
Subject: Holiday Party Quote Request - Taco Taco

 

Hi there,


I hope you had a nice weekend! I was hoping you could help with providing me a quote for a Holiday party at Taco Taco for my agency Blackjet. See details below: 

 

Group Size: 25-35

Time: 4-10pm 

Potential Dates: Dec 6, 7, 13, 14

 

Can you please provide a quote that includes costs for food, alcohol (for the 6 hr period) & any other costs associated with renting the space? I was thinking that the dining room would be a good fit for our group but open to receiving a quote for the moonlight lounge as well. 

 

Our budget is in the $8k range. 

 

Thank you! 

Kaitlin

--

 

Kaitlin Buttrum
Account Manager

C 289.707.5962

507 King Street E, Suite #222
Toronto, ON M5A 1M3

Subject: Re: New Event Inquiry

Oh I'm so sorry! You're looking at November 26th - I was looking at the wrong day. Yes it is available.  The Moonlight Lounge is available that day, and the cost to rent it is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $750 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked bar and clean up.

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. Hope you had a great weekend as well! Apologies for delay in response, absolutely - we can put a hold on November 26th for you. We will also let you know if there's any other inquiries that come in, but you have a hold until Nov 1st. 

 

To secure the space, we send you a contract to review, and if all looks good, we ask for a deposit of 50% of the rental fee to secure it. Our preference is e-transfer but we can take credit card payment too (just FYI there is a 2.8% card fee on it). For cancellations, you can get a full refund up to 3 weeks prior to the event, but there can be some flexibility with that given you're close to the 3 week timeframe. Rescheduling the event incurs no penalty, it's just based on availability. For set-up, we allow up to 45 mins prior to the event to set-up.

 

If you'd like, I can send you a contract so your team has it while reviewing/finalizing? I'd just need to know the timeframe you're looking to book so I can add it to the contract.

Oh I'm so sorry! You're looking at November 26th - I was looking at the wrong day. Yes it is available.  The Moonlight Lounge is available that day, and the cost to rent it is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $750 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked bar and clean up.

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu<http://eattaco.ca/menu>. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questions

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.


TacoTaco Events Team

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questions

 

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.



TacoTaco Events Team

(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 

eattaco.ca

Subject: Re: New Event Inquiry

 

Hi Karima,

 

Hope you had a great weekend as well! Apologies for delay in response, absolutely - we can put a hold on November 26th for you. We will also let you know if there's any other inquiries that come in, but you have a hold until Nov 1st. 

 

To secure the space, we send you a contract to review, and if all looks good, we ask for a deposit of 50% of the rental fee to secure it. Our preference is e-transfer but we can take credit card payment too (just FYI there is a 2.8% card fee on it). For cancellations, you can get a full refund up to 3 weeks prior to the event, but there can be some flexibility with that given you're close to the 3 week timeframe. Rescheduling the event incurs no penalty, it's just based on availability. For set-up, we allow up to 45 mins prior to the event to set-up.

 

If you'd like, I can send you a contract so your team has it while reviewing/finalizing? I'd just need to know the timeframe you're looking to book so I can add it to the contract.


TacoTaco Events Team

From: Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca>
Sent: October 24, 2024 2:52 PM
To: Meghan Brazil <mbrazil@evergreen.ca>
Subject: Re: New Event Inquiry

 

Oh I'm so sorry! You're looking at November 26th - I was looking at the wrong day. Yes it is available.  The Moonlight Lounge is available that day, and the cost to rent it is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $750 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked bar and clean up. 

 

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questions

 

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.



TacoTaco Events Team

(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 

eattaco.ca

On Wed, Oct 30, 2024 at 12:23 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hey Sandra!

 

Sorry, I misread your email. The $750 is the min spend on top of the rental. If you want to do a min spend only option, it would be $1750 or about $35 per person. For this, we’d ask for a deposit of $800 and will return it if the minimum spend is hit. We also partially return it if you miss the min spend. Here is the wording from the contract:

 

To host an event, a deposit of $800 is required along with a minimum spend of $1750 for the night. If the minimum spend requirement is met, the full deposit amount will be refunded. However, if the spend falls below the minimum requirement, the deposit will be forfeited in proportion to the amount by which the spend falls short.

On Sat, Nov 2, 2024 at 7:14 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Andrew,

Thank you for reaching out to TacoTaco Events! 

The Moonlight Lounge is a great space for a fundraiser and absolutely can accommodate a group of your size. We have a spacious dance floor that your students could utilize for their performances. We also have a full sound system with a Bluetooth connection and karaoke, so your students can plug in and play their music.

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizza. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person.  Let me know what package you're interested in  and I'll send you the appropriate menu.

And yup! It's accessible for students.

For the Moonlight Lounge, our rental rate is $125 per hour on Sundays or minimum spend of $1,000. This includes our additional services such as a private bar, dance floor, sound system, and more.

Please let me know if you have any further questions.

Warmly,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

----- Original Message -----

From: Andrew Tribe

Subject: Taco Taco Event Space

Good morning, 

My name is Andrew Tribe and I am the Artistic Director of the Mainstage Theatre Company in Toronto. We are a not-for-profit youth theatre company that mounts two productions per year in Toronto with youth ages 11 - 21. 

We are looking to host a fundraiser at the end of our year to celebrate the year's accomplishments and look towards the future. We also hope we can have a few of our students perform some songs (with keyboard accompaniment). Your space came recommended by one of our staff members! :) 

Our tentative dates would be either the evening of Sunday, June 1, 2025 or Sunday, June 8, 2025. 

We would be interested in the Moonlight Lounge space (194). 

What can you share about food? Is the space accessible for all ages? What is the approximate cost? 

Our company is operated by a Board of Directors, so as much info you can provide, I can relay it back to them. 

Thank you so much! 

Warmly,
Andrew. 

Andrew Tribe (he/him)
Artistic Director
Mainstage Theatre Company

Toronto, ON  M5S 3C9

TacoTaco Events Team

Let me know when you're ready. Thank you again.
- Adam    On Monday, November 4, 2024 at 10:08:22 p.m. EST, <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:  
 
 Hi Adam,

Thank you for your interest in our venue! The Moonlight Lounge is a great option for your NYE party.

We're currently in discussions with a few different promoters about our New Year's Eve booking. Unfortunately, it's a very popular night for us, so we have to choose the strongest proposal. We'll make our decision next week and be in touch soon. Thanks for your patience!

Best,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768
 
----- Original Message -----
 
From: Adam Austerberry 
 
Subject: Re: New Event Inquiry
  That's alright, thank you for the information though.
The 55 inch TV should work for what I'm doing. I plan on editing together a NYE Countdown timer and would need something to display it on. I feel a projector would work best, but the TV should be sufficient as well.
I also plan on having some DJs for the party who will be able to help me with any audio setup. I'm assuming there is an audio system of sorts available at the venue, correct? Also, is there tax on that payment you quoted me? (i.e $175/hr or $175 + HST per hour)
Either way, I would like to place a hold on the Moonlight Lounge as I do have a great interest in using the location for my party. I would just like a few days to finalize things before sending over any payments as I am in contact with a few locations as well.
Thank you again.
- Adam

Sorry! I missed this email.

  

No we don’t charge for set up and tear down time.  You have an hour for set up and about 45 mins for tear down. And the max capacity is 194 and the comfortable capacity is 150.

  

And we don’t have a projector. We only have  55 inch TV that you can connect via HDMI.

  

Sorry again for the late reply!

  

From: Adam Austerberry <amja98@rogers.com> 
Sent: Wednesday, October 30, 2024 9:01 AM
To: Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca>
Subject: Re: New Event Inquiry

  

Hi, just wanted to follow up again about the information. I'm still very interested in working together for a NYE party.

  

Thank you again!

  

- Adam

  

On Saturday, October 26, 2024 at 12:53:51 a.m. EDT, Adam Austerberry <amja98@rogers.com> wrote: 

  

  

Hi, thank you for your response!

  

I would just like to know a few clarifying questions as well for the venue. I plan on having my party between 9 PM and 2 AM, but I would need some time to set up and some a bit of time to tear down. Would I need to pay the rental fee for the setup and tear down times, or just for the party itself?

Additionally, I'd like to know what is the maximum number of guests allowed within the Moonlight Lounge, and if you have a projector and/or projector screen available.

  

Thank you again for your time, and please feel free to let me know about another details regarding the space.

  

- Adam

On Friday, October 25, 2024 at 08:30:55 p.m. EDT, Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote: 

  

  


Thank you for considering our venue for your New Year's Eve party! We are excited to inform you that our space is available on December 31st, 2024.

Based on your guest count of 150, we recommend our Moonlight Lounge, which comfortably accommodates your expected number of guests. The lounge is equipped with a dancefloor, professional sound system with karaoke, party lights, smoke machine, private bar staffed with two bartenders, and private washrooms.

For this event, the rental rate for the Moonlight Lounge would be $175 per hour, with a minimum spending requirement of $2000 . The total rental cost would depend on the duration of your event.

We also offer coat check services for your guests' convenience for $3 per person.


If you have any other questions or require further clarification on any of our services or amenities, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best regards,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

To: info@eattaco.ca <info@eattaco.ca>

Phone: 6472622544

Description: Hi there, My name is Adam and I run a group called Toronto Anime Social Hangouts (TASH for short). We host a variety of Anime and pop culture themed parties, having worked with a variety of bars and organizations, including the Toronto Fan Expo Convention. We are currently looking for venues to host a New Years Eve party on the night of Tuesday, December 31st. We're interested in working with you and you're location for this as we feel it accurately accommodates to what we need for our party. If you could please let me know any associated costs with renting the venue, as well as the availability of coat check within the venue, that would be greatly appreciated. If there is anything else you feel I should know, please feel free to fill me in. Thank you for taking the time to read my request as I anticipate your response. - Adam

Date: 2024-12-31

Thank you for reaching out to us about hosting your Y2K-themed end-of-the-year party at Moonlight Lounge on November 28, 2024. We're excited to let you know that our space is available for your event on that date.

As the event falls on a Thursday, our rental rate for the Moonlight Lounge would be $125 per hour, with a minimum spending requirement of $500. Since you mentioned approximately 120 guests, please note that our maximum capacity is 194, but we comfortably accommodate 150 guests.

Our space comes equipped with a dancefloor, professional sound system with karaoke, party lights, smoke machine, private bar staffed with two bartenders, and private washrooms. You'll also have access to our full sound system, allowing you to connect your own music via Bluetooth or use a provided tablet with a Spotify playlist. Additionally, we have a TV for use, which can be connected via HDMI port.

If you have any further questions or would like to proceed with booking, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We'd be happy to discuss more details.

Best regards,
TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

Sarah Pastor



Le lun. 4 nov. 2024 à 22:10, <info@eattaco.ca> a écrit :
Hi Sarah,

That's great! Just a heads up, that's $8 per ticket before tax and tip, which comes out to $10 each after. That would get you 60 tickets. Are you expecting 75 people?

Please let me know if you have any other questions.


Sincerely,
TacoTaco Events Team

----- Original Message -----

From: Sarah Pastor

Subject: Re: Event Contract 11/07/2024

Hi!

Based on our budget and anticipated number of guests, it would make the most sense to provide drinks but not food, the drink ticket option seems perfect. 

If tickets are $8 each, I believe $600 would buy 75 tickets, let me know if this works.

Thanks again,
Sarah Pastor

On Fri, Nov 1, 2024 at 10:31 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Sarah,

Happy Friday! Did you anticipate ordering any of our catering or drink packages? Here they are in case we didn't share:

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questions

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca
